title: TextMarker
description: A marker representing a text label

namespace.description: Namespace into which the marker should be grouped. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

id.description: Identifier for the marker. A marker will replace any prior marker on the same topic with the same `namespace` and `id`.

lifetime.description: Length of time (relative to `timestamp`) after which the marker should be automatically removed. Zero value indicates the marker should remain visible until it is replaced or deleted.
lifetime.title: Duration

frame_locked.description: Whether the marker should keep its location in the fixed frame (false) or follow the frame specified in `frame_id` as it moves relative to the fixed frame (true)

metadata.description: An entry representing a key and its associated value
metadata.title: KeyValuePair

pose.description: The position and orientation of an object or reference frame in 3D space
pose.title: Pose

position.description: A vector in 3D space that represents a direction only
position.title: Vector3

orientation.description: A [quaternion](https://eater.net/quaternions) representing a rotation in 3D space
orientation.title: Quaternion

billboard.description: Whether the text should respect `pose.orientation` (false) or always face the camera (true)

font_size.description: Font size (height of one line of text)

scale_invariant.description: Indicates whether `font_size` is a fixed size in screen pixels (true), or specified in world coordinates and scales with distance from the camera (false)
